body:
@casebenton this already had a brief once-over but I think you could dig into this a bit and make sure everything is working as expected. Let me know if you have any questions about how the code works. Definitely pull this branch down and play around with the UI and let me know if you notice anything off.

@Osmose do you think the description I provided above of how it works is ok? (search text input: filters `name` and `action` property values, filtering: toggles based on the `enabled` property) Let me know if you think we want to search or filter by anything else.
